change1: - Added: Save and restore the Analysis Response window.
change2: - Added: GUI messages with "True/False/On/Off" settings now display in appropriate colors.
change4: - Changed: The 'List XML Files' button color is now the same as the 'Click Here to Set XML Details' button.

change7: - Fixed: Corrected the alignment of the GUI buttons for getting the XML from the Android device.
